mapper.select: select * from pic where status = #{status} order by createTime desc
select * from uplevel where status = #{status} order by sendTime desc
mapper.update: update uplevel set status = #{status}, confirmTime = now() where userId = #{userId} and type = #{type}
update user_msg set role = #{role} where userId = #{userId}
update pic set status = #{status} where id = #{picId}
mapper.select: select u.nickName, u.avatarUrl, p.* from user_msg u, post p where p.status = #{status} and p.userId = u.userId order by p.send_time desc
